ygData.subject: Re: Questions about bards weapons?
ygData.msgSnippet: First off, *Drools over these excellent weapons!* and now for the important part. The barbed leather whip you might wanna sell, because the dragoon dirk and
ygData.messageBody:
First off, *Drools over these excellent weapons!* and now for the important
part.

The barbed leather whip you might wanna sell, because the dragoon dirk
and the Silvery axe and the Writhing staff all have better attack ratio's
than it. and like I just said, the writhing staff and the Silvery axe have
the same attack ratio's. I know not the stats on the Mace, so I cannot help
thee there. personally I would have writhing staff in primary, and silvery
axe in secondary :).

Gleeman Merrilin, Bard of the 20th song (.5 bubbles from 21 again, after
falling out of the aviak house :( ).
Currently dual weilding a Silvery axe and a Dragoon Dirk :)
-----Original Message-----
From: CMai <CMai@...>
To: Eqbards (E-mail) <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 12:31 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Questions about bards weapons?


>From: CMai <CMai@...>
>
>I am lvl 33 bard. I need advice on weapons.
>
>I have a
>
>writhing staff
>barbed whip
>black enamel Mace
>Dragoon Dirk
>Silver axe
>
>I am thinking of getting a crystalline blade and an obsidian shard.
>
>I was wondering which 2 weapons out of the 7 do you all think is best to
>use?
>
>Thank you,
>Your Friendly Rogue and Bard
>Hammerpaw and Samiam Syren Wind
>Champions of Norrath, The Rathe
>
>
>
